headerText: The `v-item-group` provides the ability to create a group of selectable items out of any component. This is the baseline functionality for components such as `v-tabs` and `v-carousel`.

usage.desc: The core usage of the `v-item-group` is to create groups of anything that should be controlled by a **model**.

post.desc: Easily hook up a custom chip group.

toggle-pictures.desc: Icons can be used as toggle buttons when they allow selection, or deselection, of a single choice, such as marking an item as a favorite.

multiple.desc: Item groups can have multiple items selected.

mandatory.desc: **mandatory** item groups must have aty least 1 item selected.

active-class.desc: **activeClass** property allows you to set custom CSS class on active items.

props.activeClass: CSS Class to apply when active
props.mandatory: Forces a value to always be selected
props.multiple: Allows for multiple selections. Model used must be an `Array`
